Sentencas: The variation of the joining performance of glass-ceramic sealants in the form of a paste as a function of the solid powder content in the sealing paste after the formation and a number of thermal cycles are experimentally studied.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Three different sealing pastes having 40, 50 and 60 wt % solid loadings are prepared and tested for this purpose.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The pastes are applied between two metallic interconnector plates and subjected to a glass formation step for the joining.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The fracture strengths of 24 samples prepared for each case are determined via tensile tests.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Similarly, the mechanical performances of the sealants after 3, 6 and 9 thermal cycles are also obtained.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results reveal that the joining strength tends to increase with the amount of solid powder content in the paste.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This can be attributed to increased number of crystalline phases in the sealants with increasing the solid loading.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The thermal cycles, on the other hand, are shown to have an adverse effect on the joining performance regardless of the solid loading.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the rate of decrease in the fracture strengths is found to decrease with the solid powder contents in the pastes.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This can be elucidated by the amount of glassy phases in the sealants, which can be expected to increase with the solid loading and provide self-healing ability.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The microstructures of the fracture surfaces of all samples are also investigated by a scanning electron microscopy.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The obtained images confirm the tensile test results.
Titulo: Effects of solid loading on joining and thermal cycling performance of glass-ceramic sealing pastes for solid oxide fuel cells
